# cmichel

warden

OG Warden

Available for Hire

I'm a **security researcher 🏹🐛**, **developer 👨‍💻**, and **author ✍️**. For
the past 3 years, I've been focusing on smart contract security audits.

## Highlights

  * [Ranked #1 all-time on Code4rena leaderboard](https://c4stage.code4rena.com/leaderboard)

As of June 2023, I'm ranked the #1 security auditor on Code4rena's all-time
leaderboard with $1.3M in earnings.

## cmichel's Activity

The Activity Stream is currently in beta. [Share feedback here](/help).

## Available for hire

[Get a quote](https://code4rena.typeform.com/solo-
audit#warden=cmichel&source=cmichel-profile)

  * [Twitter](https://twitter.com/cmichelio)
  * [Blog](https://cmichel.io/)
